con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline=${project-deadline} init-date=${project-init-date} name=${project-name} code=${project-code}> </order> </order-list>

con:request.name: Request 1 machine
con:request.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <machine code=${ressource-code} name=${machine-name} description=${machine-desc}/>
</resource-list>

con:request.name: Request 2 worker
con:request.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <machine code=${ressource-code} firstname=${worker-firstname} surname=${worker-surname} nif=${worker-nif}/>
</resource-list>

con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <base-calendar-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <base-calendar name=${calendrier-name} code=${calendrier-code}> <calendar-data-list> <calendar-data code=${calendrier-data-code}> <hours-per-day-list> <hours-per-day hours="7" day="MONDAY" /> <hours-per-day hours="7" day="TUESDAY" /> <hours-per-day hours="7" day="WEDNESDAY" /> <hours-per-day hours="7" day="THURSDAY" /> <hours-per-day hours="7" day="FRIDAY" /> </hours-per-day-list> </calendar-data> </calendar-data-list> </base-calendar> </base-calendar-list>

con:restRequest.name: POST create projet - Request 1
con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline=${project-deadline} init-date=${project-init-date} name=${project-name} code=${project-code}> </order> </order-list>

con:restRequest.name: POST create projet - Request 1 - 2
con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline=${project-deadline} init-date=${project-init-date} name=${project-name} code=${project-code}> </order> </order-list>

con:restRequest.name: POST create projet - Request 1 - 3
con:restRequest.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?> <order-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <order calendar-name="Default" dependencies-constraints-have-priority="false" deadline=${project-deadline} init-date=${project-init-date} name=${project-name} code=${project-code}> </order> </order-list>

con:config.script: def key = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GET get all ressources - Request 1 1").testRequest.response.getTimestamp(); properties = testRunner.testCase.testSuite properties.setPropertyValue("worker-code",'"w'+key+'w"') properties.setPropertyValue("machine-code",'"m'+key+'m"') properties.setPropertyValue("machine-code-raw",'m'+key+'m')

con:restRequest.name: POST create ressource - Request 1 machine 3
con:restRequest.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <machine code=${#TestSuite#machine-code} name=${#TestSuite#machine-code} description=${machine-desc}/>
</resource-list>

con:restRequest.name: POST create ressource - Request 2 worker 5
con:restRequest.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<resource-list xmlns="http://rest.ws.libreplan.org"> <worker code=${#TestSuite#worker-code} first-name=${worker-firstname} surname=${worker-surname} nif=${#TestSuite#worker-code}/>
</resource-list>
